channel.title: How to connect without port forward
channel.description: Now I believe the issue is because I can't portforward on my router because its my brothers so I can't get in to do anything for portforwarding to 43594 is there any other possible way to port forward on my ip address

item.title: How to connect without port forward
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

Don’t restore the router to factory settings. You will have to setup the router again, and if you don’t know what you are doing you’ll have to get your ISP to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect without port forward

item.title: How to connect without port forward
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

If the router has a reset button on the back which most of them do you can do that. It will restore the router to factory settings login and pass which will allow you to get in and try to portforward. Otherwise you will have to try utorrent or hamachi which you shouldn’t really use unless you have to.

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect without port forward

item.title: How to connect without port forward
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

djzone:

Use logmein hamachi, make a network, get your brothers to join, have fun.

To bad that has a limit.

Most likely your brother hasn’t set a password or username so you the default log in for the router which you can find online, for the most part admin and pass should work.

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect without port forward

item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I haven’t found any others that work. I’ve only heard bad things about the uTorrent method and I would recommend just getting your own router or asking him
